title: Preventing AI Deepfake Abuse: An Islamic Ethics Framework
summary: The rapid development of deepfake technology powered by AI has raised global concerns regarding the manipulation of information, the usurpation of digital identities, and the erosion of public trust in the authenticity of online content.
